chart.title: Peak search concurrency over time (last 24 hours)
chart.searchString: index=_internal source=*metrics.log group=search_concurrency "system total" NOT user=* | timechart max(active_hist_searches) as "Historical Searches" max(active_realtime_searches) as "Real-time Searches"

chart.title: Search count by user (last 24 hours)
chart.searchString: `audit_searchlocal` | search user!="n/a" | timechart count by user

chart.title: Run time by user (last 24 hours)
chart.searchString: `audit_searchlocal` | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user max(total_run_time) as total_run_time by search_id | stats sum(total_run_time) by user | sort - sum(total_run_time) | head 5

table.title: Common searches (last hour)
table.searchString: `audit_searchlocal` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | `audit_rexsearch` | stats first(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(user) as user first(search) as search by search_id | search user=* | stats count dc(user) as users avg(total_run_time) as "Average run time (s)" by search | sort - count

table.title: Recent searches by time (last hour)
table.searchString: `audit_searchlocal` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | `audit_rexsearch` | eval is_scheduled = if(search_id LIKE "scheduler%", "yes", "no") | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user first(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search first(is_scheduled) as is_scheduled by search_id | search user=* | sort - _time

table.title: Recent searches by expense (last hour)
table.searchString: `audit_searchlocal` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | `audit_rexsearch` | eval is_scheduled = if(search_id LIKE "scheduler%", "yes", "no") | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user first(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search first(is_scheduled) as is_scheduled by search_id | search user=* | sort - total_run_time
